Translations.Text: Consequently he nie has znamy tu
Nor any food except bitter variety
Food for sinners
Ja swear co ona see
A co ona nie see
This bol utterance honorable posol
Nie utterance poet; zriedka robit ona verit
Nor utterance soothsayer; zriedka robit ona berie heed
revelation z Lord universe
Had he uttered any inaksie teachings
My punished him
My zastavit revelations him
Ziaden z ona pomoc him
This bol reminder for the righteous
My zauzlit; some z ona bol rejectors
It bol zalost disbelievers
It bol absolute truth
Therefore ona glorify vola sa tvoj Lord Velky
questioner question inevitable retribution
For disbelievers ziaden zastavit it
Z GOD Possessor highest Height
angels ich zvest climb do Him do dni equals 50000 rocnik
Therefore ona vyletne miesto gracious patience
For they see it daleko away
chvila my see it vela koniec
Dni pojdem when sky bol molten rocks
mountains bol fluffy wool
Ziaden znamy care jeho koniec znamy
